BadgeDetail.Name: Business Finance
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has the fundamental financial knowledge required to be successful. They can accurately calculate product costs and pricing; produce a cashflow forecast and know the main ways to access investment.

Task.Title: Business finance
Task.Body: Upload a finance plan detailing the business costs, pricing strategy and cashflow forecast using the 3 templates provided.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload a finance plan detailing the business costs, pricing strategy and cashflow forecast using the 3 templates provided.
Task.TextileBody: Upload a finance plan detailing the business costs, pricing strategy and cashflow forecast using the 3 templates provided.

Task.Title: Funding
Task.Body: Upload a description of the main sources of investment funding available and a plan showing how to finance the business idea.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload a description of the main sources of investment funding available and a plan showing how to finance the business idea.
Task.TextileBody: Upload a description of the main sources of investment funding available and a plan showing how to finance the business idea.
